(:action select ; Select an item and update its status
  :parameters (?p - person ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?item) (suitable ?item))
  :effect (selected ?item)
)

(:action make
    ; Combine various tasks involving creation, assembly, or modification of items
    :parameters (?p - player ?item1 - object ?item2 - object ?final_item - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (or (selected ?item1) (inventory ?p ?item1) (found ?item2))
        (or (not (inventory ?p ?item1)) (not (assembled ?item1 ?item2)))
    )
    :effect (and 
        (or (inventory ?p ?final_item) (completed ?final_item))

(:action add
    ; Add or attach an item to another item
    :parameters (?agent - person ?item1 - object ?item2 - object)
    :precondition (and (possessed ?agent ?item2) (not (attached ?item1 ?item2)))
    :effect (attached ?item1 ?item2)
)
